channel.title: [Class Suggestion] The Hexer, neutral offensive
channel.description:
Hexer. Neutral offensive, magic user. Cannot be converted.
Passive 1 : Immune to occupy.
Passive 2 : If someone cursed die at night, its body stays as a liveless puppet. Puppets are occupy immune, cannot be reaped, converted, psylinked, bled or poisoned. Puppets are neutrals.
Day Ability 1: Gets all your puppets to vote with you (can be used during trial, even yours, then they would be pardoning). 2 uses.
Day ability 2: If someone try to visit you tonight, it will be redirected to the puppet you target. 2 uses.
Night Ability 1: Curse Occupy your target. It becomes cursed for 2 night. (you cannot curse occupy immune target that way) Infinite use.
Night Ability 2 : Spread Everyone visiting or being visited by your target gets cursed for 2 night. Can only be used on a cursed target. 1 uses.
Win condition: Make 3 puppets.
Comments: The idea behind this is a neutral that is not a killer, but still a threat somehow. Maybe its closer to "special" than offensive, i don't know.. Of course, biggest counter is Psychic. Knight is very strong too as it gets lots of CS targets. I'm unsure about winning condition. Living till the end would work? but maybe something different.. The way i put it, he can still win when dead. But this part i'm quite unsure. The easiest claim would be butler.
Any thoughs?
